creditline: Lent by Mrs. John Richard Savage
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Buddha's hands, one in abhayamudra and one in varadamura; traces of black lacquer, mounted in wood, Siamese, bronze, H.6-7/8 x W.2-1/2 in. without stand.
dimension: H.3-7/8 x W.2-1/2 in. without stand
title: Buddha's Hands
